data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: To start the eXe, double-click the eXe icon that should have appeared on your desktop after installation. If ____ don't ____ an eXe icon ____ your ____ you ____ need ____ find ____ application's ____ in ____ Windows ____ menu ____ Programs. You should probably maximise the eXe window to utilize all the space you have available to work in.
data.partBlankContent: To start the eXe, double-click the eXe icon that should have appeared on your desktop after installation. If y__ don't ha__ an eXe icon o_ your des____ you wi__ need t_ find t__ application's ic__ in yo__ Windows st___ menu un___ Programs. You should probably maximise the eXe window to utilize all the space you have available to work in.
data.answer: 要启动eXe，双击安装后应该出现在桌面上的eXe图标。如果您的桌面上没有eXe图标，您需要在Windows开始菜单中的“程序”下找到该应用程序的图标。您可能应该最大化eXe窗口，以利用所有可用的工作空间。
